0: I met this girl when I was 3 years old
1: And what I loved most she had so much soul
2: She said "Excuse me lil homey, I know you don't know me
3: But, my name is Windy and I like to blow trees"
4: And from that point I never blow her off
5: Niggas come from out of town, I like to show her off
6: They like to act tough, she like to tow 'em off
7: And make 'em straighten up their hat cause she know they soft
8: And when I grew up she showed me how to go downtown
9: In the nighttime her face lit up,
12: I told her in my heart is where she'll always be
13: She never messed with entertainers cause they always leave
14: She said it felt like they walked and drove on me
15: Knew I was gang affiliated, got on TV and told on me
16: I guess that's why last winter she got so cold on me
17: She said "'Ye, keep making that keep making that platinum and gold for me!"
18: But if you really cared for her
19: Then you wouldn't have never hit the airport to follow your dreams
20: Sometimes I still talk to her, but when I talk to her
21: It always seems like she talking 'bout me
22: She said, "You left your kids, and they just like you
23: They want to rap and make soul beats just like you
24: But they just not you" and I just got through
25: Talking 'bout what we tryna do: just not new
26: Now everybody got the game figured out all wrong
27: I guess you never know what you got 'til it's gone
28: I guess that's why I'm here and
30: And guess when I heard that? When I was back home
31: Every interview I'm representing you, making you proud
32: Reach for the stars so if you fall, you land on a cloud
33: Jump in the crowd, spark your lighters, wave 'em around
34: If you don't know by now, I'm talking 'bout Chi-Town!
title: Homecoming
